items.name: Passage of time
results: Season or age turns next session

items.name: Unresolved situations
results: It goes as bad as it could possibly go.

items.name: Wilderness roll
results: Encounter the next Omen from a Random Myth [/roll d6] in this Realm.
Encounter the next Omen from the Nearest Myth.
Encounter the Hex’s Landmark. Otherwise All Clear.

items.name: Travelling Blind
results: Circle back to where you started.
Drift a hex to the Left (2) or Right (3).

items.name: Dire weather
results: Dire Weather. You can’t leave the Hex and can’t get proper sleep.
Looming Threat. If this is rolled a second consecutive time, treat as Dire Weather

items.name: Local mood
results: Occupied by a looming or recent crisis
There is a sense of things in decline
A fine mood and all seems well enough

items.name: Crisis
results: Debt - Dire need of coffer and coin.
Lying to you about their intent.

items.name: Increased taxes
results: Your coffers are filled, but take a Crisis.

items.name: The verdy maze - Place
results: Entwined Wall of Trunks and Roots

items.name: Company of the order - Scholar-Knight
results: A scholar-knight on foot, their steed slain

The cost of unlife - The Cost

results: Scare them back to the surface
Show them things they cannot take home

items.name: Pack fighting tactics - First
results: Start a fire with claw and stone

items.name: Pack fighting tactics - Then
results: Go and dig a pit trap

results: Guilty, sentence to come next Season

results: Must be imprisoned in the Citadel

items.name: Boneborn forms - Body
results: Sprawling (roll twice on the Attack column)

results: Spring slash (d8, free move after the Attack)

results: Can eat raw and rotten meat

results: Pass a CLA Save or wander the wilderness

The next person the Company meets

results: They do not have any of their memories

The harp, played by its creator - Duration

results: Attack nearest ally, stopping only when Mortally Wounded
